summary.span: 表示時間間隔。

span.span: Represents a time interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件都代表測量為正數或負數數天、 時、 分、 秒和小數秒的時間間隔 （持續時間的經過時間或時間）。A object represents a time interval (duration of time or elapsed time) that is measured as a positive or negative number of days, hours, minutes, seconds, and fractions of a second. 結構也可用來代表一天，但僅限於的時間，如果特定的日期時間無關。The structure can also be used to represent the time of day, but only if the time is unrelated to a particular date. 否則，請或結構應改為使用。Otherwise, the or structure should be used instead. (如需使用詳細資訊結構，以反映當日時間，請參閱 < [ 選擇 DateTime、 DateTimeOffset、 TimeSpan 和 TimeZoneInfo 之間](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md)。)(For more information about using the structure to reflect the time of day, see [Choosing Between DateTime, DateTimeOffset, TimeSpan, and TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md).) > [!NOTE] > A值代表時間間隔，以及可以表示為特定數目的天數、 時、 分、 秒及毫秒為單位。A value represents a time interval and can be expressed as a particular number of days, hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds. 因為它代表一般的時間間隔，而不會參考特定的開始或結束點時，無法以表示年和月，這兩者都有不同數目的天數。Because it represents a general interval without reference to a particular start or end point, it cannot be expressed in terms of years and months, both of which have a variable number of days. 不同於值，表示日期和時間，而不會為特定時區的參考，或值，表示特定的時間點的時間。It differs from a value, which represents a date and time without reference to a particular time zone, or a value, which represents a specific moment of time. 最大單位時間結構用來測量持續時間是一天。The largest unit of time that the structure uses to measure duration is a day. 時間間隔是以天數衡量回應為求一致，因為較大的時間，例如月和年，單位中的天數數目而有所不同。Time intervals are measured in days for consistency, because the number of days in larger units of time, such as months and years, varies. 值物件是否等於表示的時間間隔的刻度數。The value of a object is the number of ticks that equal the represented time interval. 刻度等於 100 奈秒或一個十的第二個。A tick is equal to 100 nanoseconds, or one ten-millionth of a second. 值物件的範圍可以從至。The value of a object can range from to . ## TimeSpan 值具現化Instantiating a TimeSpan Value 您可以具現化數種方式中的值：You can instantiate a value in a number of ways: - 藉由呼叫其隱含預設建構函式。By calling its implicit default constructor. 這會建立的物件，其值為，如下列範例所示。This creates an object whose value is , as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/instantiate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/instantiate1.vb#2)] - 藉由呼叫其中一個其明確的建構函式。By calling one of its explicit constructors. 下列範例會初始化值到指定的數字的時數、 分鐘和秒。The following example initializes a value to a specified number of hours, minutes, and seconds. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/instantiate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/instantiate1.vb#3)] - 藉由呼叫方法，或執行的作業會傳回值。By calling a method or performing an operation that returns a value. 例如，您可以具現化值，表示兩個日期和時間值，如下列範例所示的間隔。For example, you can instantiate a value that represents the interval between two date and time values, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/instantiate1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/instantiate1.vb#4)] 您也可以初始化如此一來，如下列範例所示的零時間值的物件。You can also initialize a object to a zero time value in this way, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/zero1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/zero1.vb#6)] 算術運算子和方法的傳回值， ，和結構。 values are returned by arithmetic operators and methods of the , , and structures. - 藉由剖析的字串表示值。By parsing the string representation of a value. 您可以使用並方法，將包含時間間隔的字串轉換值。You can use the and methods to convert strings that contain time intervals to values. 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的字串陣列值。The following example uses the method to convert an array of strings to values. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/instantiate1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/instantiate1.vb#5)] 此外，您可以在其中定義精確的剖析和轉換成輸入的字串格式值，藉由呼叫或方法。In addition, you can define the precise format of the input string to be parsed and converted to a value by calling the or method. ## TimeSpan 值上執行的作業Performing Operations on TimeSpan Values 您可以加入和減去使用的持續時間並運算子，或藉由呼叫和方法。You can add and subtract time durations either by using the and operators, or by calling the and methods. 您也可以藉由呼叫來比較兩個持續時間， ，和方法。You can also compare two time durations by calling the , , and methods. 結構也會包含和方法，將時間間隔轉換為正數和負數的值，The structure also includes the and methods, which convert time intervals to positive and negative values, 範圍值是至。The range of values is to . ## 格式化時間範圍值Formatting a TimeSpan Value A值可以表示為 [*-*]*d*。*hh*:*公釐*:*ss*。*ff*，選擇性的負號表示負的時間間隔，其中*d*元件為天數， *hh*為 24 小時制，小時*mm*分鐘， *ss*時 （秒），以及*ff*是小數秒。A value can be represented as [*-*]*d*.*hh*:*mm*:*ss*.*ff*, where the optional minus sign indicates a negative time interval, the *d* component is days, *hh* is hours as measured on a 24-hour clock, *mm* is minutes, *ss* is seconds, and *ff* is fractions of a second. 也就是將時間間隔所組成的正數或負數天數不包含的日期時間或數天的日期時間或一天的時間。That is, a time interval consists of a positive or negative number of days without a time of day, or a number of days with a time of day, or only a time of day. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則結構支援區分文化特性格式，透過多載其方法，它會將轉換為其字串表示的值。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the structure supports culture-sensitive formatting through the overloads of its method, which converts a value to its string representation. 預設值方法會傳回使用等同於它的傳回值，在舊版.NET Framework 的非變異格式的時間間隔。The default method returns a time interval by using an invariant format that is identical to its return value in previous versions of the .NET Framework. 多載可讓您指定的格式字串，定義的時間間隔的字串表示。The overload lets you specify a format string that defines the string representation of the time interval. 多載可讓您指定格式字串和文化特性的格式化慣例來建立的時間間隔的字串表示。The overload lets you specify a format string and the culture whose formatting conventions are used to create the string representation of the time interval. 支援兩個標準和自訂格式字串。 supports both standard and custom format strings. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。)不過，只有標準格式字串會區分文化特性。(For more information, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).) However, only standard format strings are culture-sensitive. ## 還原舊版格式的時間範圍Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting 在某些情況下，程式碼中，成功格式中的值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中失敗[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。In some cases, code that successfully formats values in [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions fails in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 這是在呼叫的程式碼中最常見[< TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode > 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)方法來格式化以格式字串的值。This is most common in code that calls a [ element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) method to format a value with a format string. 下列範例已成功格式化中的值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和更早版本，但在擲回例外狀況[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和更新版本。The following example successfully formats a value in [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, but throws an exception in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later versions. 請注意，它會嘗試格式化值使用不支援的格式規範，會忽略[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和更早版本。Note that it attempts to format a value by using an unsupported format specifier, which is ignored in [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class.Legacy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.legacy/cs/legacycode1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class.Legacy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.legacy/vb/legacycode1.vb#1)] 如果您無法修改程式碼，您可以還原的舊版格式中透過下列方式的其中一個值：If you cannot modify the code, you can restore the legacy formatting of values in one of the following ways: - 藉由建立組態檔包含[< TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode > 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)。By creating a configuration file that contains the [ element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md). 設定這個項目的`enabled`屬性設定為`true`還原舊版格式化每個應用程式為基礎。Setting this element's `enabled` attribute to `true` restores legacy formatting on a per-application basis. - 藉由設定 「 NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode 「 相容性時，切換建立應用程式定義域。By setting the "NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode" compatibility switch when you create an application domain. 這可讓舊版格式化每個應用程式定義域為基礎。This enables legacy formatting on a per-application-domain basis. 下列範例會建立應用程式定義域使用舊版格式化。The following example creates an application domain that uses legacy formatting. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class.AppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.appdomain/cs/perappdomain1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class.AppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.appdomain/vb/perappdomain1.vb#1)] 當新的應用程式定義域中，執行下列程式碼時，它會還原成舊版格式化行為。When the following code executes in the new application domain, it reverts to legacy formatting behavior. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class.AppDomain#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.appdomain/cs/showtimespan.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class.AppDomain#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class.appdomain/vb/showtimespan.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，表示兩個日期之間的差異。The following example instantiates a object that represents the difference between two dates. 然後它會顯示物件的屬性。It then displays the object's properties. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/cs/structure1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/vb/structure1.vb#1)] [!code-powershell[System.TimeSpan.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/powershell/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.class/ps/structure1.ps1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A值可以表示為 [*-*]*d*。*hh*:*公釐*:*ss*。*ff*，選擇性的負號表示負的時間間隔，其中*d*元件為天數， *hh*為 24 小時制，小時*mm*分鐘， *ss*時 （秒），以及*ff*是小數秒。A value can be represented as [*-*]*d*.*hh*:*mm*:*ss*.*ff*, where the optional minus sign indicates a negative time interval, the *d* component is days, *hh* is hours as measured on a 24-hour clock, *mm* is minutes, *ss* is seconds, and *ff* is fractions of a second. 值屬性是日期元件， *d*。The value of the property is the day component, *d*. 屬性表示整個天數，而屬性代表整數和小數的天數。The property represents whole days, whereas the property represents whole and fractional days. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數個物件，並顯示每個屬性。The following example creates several objects and displays the property of each. summary.span: 將時間間隔的字串表示，轉換成與其相等的 。

span.span: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its equivalent.

returns.span: 時間間隔，對應至 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`參數會包含在表單中的時間間隔規格：The `s` parameter contains a time interval specification in the form: [*ws*] [-] { *d* | [*d*。]*hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[。*ff*]]} [*ws*][*ws*][-]{ *d* | [*d*.]*hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[.*ff*]] }[*ws*] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 一個選取項目從清單中的大括號括住的替代項目 （{和}），中間以分隔號分隔 (|) 是必要。One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |-|選擇性的負號，表示負。An optional minus sign, which indicates a negative .| |*d**d*|天數，範圍從 0 到 10675199。Days, ranging from 0 to 10675199.| |。.|區分文化特性符號分隔天的小時。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates days from hours. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*hh**hh*|時數，範圍從 0 到 23 之間。Hours, ranging from 0 to 23.| |::|區分文化特性的時間分隔符號的符號。The culture-sensitive time separator symbol. 非變異格式使用冒號 (":") 字元。The invariant format uses a colon (":") character.| |*mm**mm*|分鐘數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Minutes, ranging from 0 to 59.| |*ss**ss*|選擇性的秒數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Optional seconds, ranging from 0 to 59.| |*.**.*|區分文化特性符號用來區隔來自小數秒的秒數。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates seconds from fractions of a second. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*ff**ff*|選擇性小數秒數，到七個十進位數字所組成。Optional fractional seconds, consisting of one to seven decimal digits.| 如果`s`引數不是日期值，它必須包含小時和分鐘數元件，其他元件是選擇性的。If the `s` argument is not a day value only, it must include an hours and a minutes component; other components are optional. 如果有，每個時間元件的值必須落在指定範圍內。If they are present, the values of each time component must fall within a specified range. 例如，值*hh*的時數元件，必須是介於 0 到 23 之間。For example, the value of *hh*, the hours component, must be between 0 and 23. 因為此，傳遞"23: 00:00"至方法會傳回 23 個小時的時間間隔。Because of this, passing "23:00:00" to the method returns a time interval of 23 hours. 相反地，傳遞 「 24: 00:00"會傳回 24 天的時間間隔。On the other hand, passing "24:00:00" returns a time interval of 24 days. 因為 「 24 」 超出範圍的時數元件，它會解譯為天數元件。Because "24" is outside the range of the hours component, it is interpreted as the days component. 組成`s`必須共同指定時間間隔，大於或等於且小於或等於。The components of `s` must collectively specify a time interval that is greater than or equal to and less than or equal to . 方法會嘗試剖析`s`透過使用目前文化特性的特定文化特性的格式。The method tries to parse `s` by using each of the culture-specific formats for the current culture. ## 呼叫端注意事項Notes to callers 當時間間隔元件會剖析字串中的包含七個以上的數字時，剖析在.NET Framework 3.5 和舊版中的作業行為可能會以不同的方式從.NET Framework 4 和更新版本中的剖析作業。When a time interval component in the string to be parsed contains more than seven digits, parsing operations in the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions may behave differently from parsing operations in the .NET Framework 4 and later versions. 在某些情況下，剖析在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本中成功的作業可能會失敗並擲回在.NET Framework 4 和更新版本。In some cases, parsing operations that succeed in the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions may fail and throw an in the .NET Framework 4 and later. 在其他情況下，剖析作業會擲回在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本的版本可能會失敗並擲回在.NET Framework 4 和更新版本。In other cases, parsing operations that throw a in the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions may fail and throw an in the .NET Framework 4 and later. 下列範例說明這兩種案例。The following example illustrates both scenarios. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.Parse#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.parse/cs/parsefailure1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.Parse#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.parse/vb/parsefailure1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的字串陣列中每個項目值。The following example uses the method to convert each element in a string array to a value. 克羅埃西亞文-克羅埃西亞 (「 於 HR-HR") 和英文-美國 ("EN-US") 來說明目前系統文化特性會在剖析作業的影響，它就會變更目前的系統文化特性。It changes the current system culture to Croatian - Croatia ("hr-HR") and English - United States ("en-US") to illustrate how the current system culture affects the parsing operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是所定義之格式的字串表示`format`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 因為`input`的格式必須符合`format`完全，您應該一律使用例外狀況處理時將使用者的字串輸入轉換成時間間隔。Because `input` must conform to the format of `format` exactly, you should always use exception handling when converting a string input by the user to a time interval. 如果您不想使用例外狀況處理，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to use exception handling, you can call the method instead. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用指定的文化特性的慣例`formatProvider`參數只有當`format`是一種標準格式化其值為"g"或"G"的字串。The method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if `format` is a standard format string whose value is either "g" or "G". "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果`format`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if `format` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析數個使用不同的格式字串和文化特性的時間間隔字串表示。The following example uses the method to parse several string representations of time intervals using various format strings and cultures. "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果使用的格式字串來剖析`input`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將轉換的字串陣列，以每個項目值。The following example calls the method to convert each element of a string array to a value. 此範例會解譯使用法文-法國 ("FR-FR") 文化特性的格式化慣例的字串。The example interprets the strings using the formatting conventions of the French - France ("fr-FR") culture. 字串可以代表一般短格式或一般長格式的時間間隔。The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format. 此外，範例會變更的時間間隔的剖析方法將解譯的單一數字的方式。In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit. 一般情況下，單一數字會解譯為時間間隔中的日數。Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval. 相反地，`%h`自訂格式字串用來將單一數字解譯成的時數。Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours. 這項變更生效，請注意，`%h`自訂格式字串前面必須加上中的其他格式字串`formats`陣列。For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是其中一種格式所定義的字串表示`formats`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in one of the formats defined by the `formats` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 因為`input`必須完全符合其中一種格式中指定`formats`，將使用者的字串輸入轉換成時間間隔時，您應該一律使用例外狀況處理。Because `input` must exactly conform to one of the formats specified in `formats`, you should always use exception handling when converting a string input by the user to a time interval. 如果您不想使用例外狀況處理，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to use exception handling, you can call the method instead. `formats`參數是字串陣列，其項目包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements consist of either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). `input` 必須確實對應到的成員`formats`的剖析作業成功。`input` must correspond exactly to a member of `formats` for the parse operation to succeed. 剖析作業會嘗試比對`input`每個項目的`formats`陣列中的第一個元素開始。The parse operation attempts to match `input` to each element in `formats` starting with the first element in the array. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用指定的文化特性的慣例`formatProvider`參數，用來剖析的格式字串時，才`input`是一種標準格式化其值為"g"或"G"的字串。The method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string whose value is either "g" or "G". "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果使用的格式字串來剖析`input`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. `styles`參數會影響解譯使用自訂格式字串會剖析的字串。The `styles` parameter affects the interpretation of strings that are parsed using custom format strings. 它會判斷是否`input`會解譯為負時間間隔中，只有當負號存在 ()，或是否一律解譯為負時間間隔 ()。It determines whether `input` is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present (), or whether it is always interpreted as a negative time interval (). 如果未使用，則`format`必須包含常值的負號 (例如"\\-") 才能成功剖析負的時間間隔。If is not used, `format` must include a literal negative sign symbol (such as "\\-") to successfully parse a negative time interval. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將轉換的字串陣列，以每個項目值。The following example calls the method to convert each element of a string array to a value. 字串可以代表一般短格式或一般長格式的時間間隔。The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format. 此外，範例會變更的時間間隔的剖析方法將解譯的單一數字的方式。In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit. 一般情況下，單一數字會解譯為時間間隔中的日數。Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval. 相反地，`%h`自訂格式字串用來將單一數字解譯成的時數。Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours. 這項變更生效，請注意，`%h`自訂格式字串前面必須加上中的其他格式字串`formats`陣列。For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array. 也請注意，輸出中，只有在使用此格式規範剖析的字串時，才使用方法呼叫中指定的旗標。Also note from the output that the flag specified in the method call is used only when parsing a string with this format specifier. remarks.format: ## Remarks A值可以表示為 [*-*]*d*。*hh*:*公釐*:*ss*。*ff*，選擇性的負號表示負的時間間隔，其中*d*元件為天數， *hh*為 24 小時制，小時*mm*分鐘， *ss*時 （秒），以及*ff*是小數秒。A value can be represented as [*-*]*d*.*hh*:*mm*:*ss*.*ff*, where the optional minus sign indicates a negative time interval, the *d* component is days, *hh* is hours as measured on a 24-hour clock, *mm* is minutes, *ss* is seconds, and *ff* is fractions of a second. 值屬性是秒數元件， *ss*。The value of the property is the seconds component, *ss*. 屬性表示完整的秒數，而屬性代表整數和小數的秒數。The property represents whole seconds, whereas the property represents whole and fractional seconds. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數個物件，並顯示每個屬性。The following example creates several objects and displays the property of each. summary.span: 將目前 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 目前 值的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the current value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的字串會以"c"格式規範格式化，並具有下列格式：The returned string is formatted with the "c" format specifier and has the following format: [-][*d*.]*hh*:*mm*:*ss*[.*fffffff*][-][*d*.]*hh*:*mm*:*ss*[.*fffffff*] 方括號中的項目 （[和]） 可能不會包含在傳回的字串。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) may not be included in the returned string. 冒號和句號 (: and) 是常值字元。Colons and periods (: and.) are literal characters. 下表詳列的非常值項目。The non-literal elements are listed in the following table. 請注意，所傳回的字串方法不會區分文化特性。Note that the string returned by the method is not culture-sensitive. |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |"-""-"|負號，表示負的時間間隔。A minus sign, which indicates a negative time interval. 包含正值的時間範圍內的任何符號不。No sign is included for a positive time span.| |「*d*""*d*"|時間間隔中的日數。The number of days in the time interval. 如果時間間隔是少於一天，則會忽略這個項目。This element is omitted if the time interval is less than one day.| |「*hh*""*hh*"|在時間間隔內，範圍從 0 到 23 的時數。The number of hours in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 23.| |「*公釐*""*mm*"|在時間間隔內，範圍從 0 到 59 的分鐘數。The number of minutes in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 59.| |「*ss*""*ss*"|在時間間隔內，範圍從 0 到 59 的秒數。The number of seconds in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 59.| |「*fffffff*""*fffffff*"|時間間隔中的小數秒數。Fractional seconds in the time interval. 如果時間間隔不包括小數秒數，則會忽略這個項目。This element is omitted if the time interval does not include fractional seconds. 如果存在，小數秒一律會使用七個十進位數字來表示。If present, fractional seconds are always expressed using seven decimal digits.| > [!NOTE] > 如需有關比較的字串表示法Oracle 資料類型，請參閱知識庫文件和[324577:System.TimeSpan 與 Oracle 9i 間隔日至第二個資料型別不符](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=161146)。For more information about comparing the string representation of and Oracle data types, see Knowledge Base article [324577: System.TimeSpan Does Not Match Oracle 9i INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND Data Type](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=161146). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示藉由呼叫傳回的字串方法數值。The following example displays the strings returned by calling the method with a number of values. 請注意，雖然此範例不會呼叫直接管理，它會呼叫方法方法時，它會嘗試將為其字串表示的值。Note that although the example does not call the method directly, it is called by the method when it attempts to convert a value to its string representation. remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`參數可以是任何有效的標準或自訂格式規範值。The `format` parameter can be any valid standard or custom format specifier for values. 如果`format`等於是否`null`，目前的傳回值物件的格式使用常見的格式規範 ("c")。If `format` is equal to or is `null`, the return value of the current object is formatted with the common format specifier ("c"). 如果`format`是任何其他值，則方法會擲回。If `format` is any other value, the method throws a . 如果`format`是標準格式字串，傳回字串的格式由目前的文化特性的格式化慣例。If `format` is a standard format string, the format of the returned string is defined by the formatting conventions of the current culture. > [!IMPORTANT] > 自訂格式字串值不包含日期或時間的分隔符號。The custom format strings for values do not include a date or time separator. 如果您想要包含這些項目在格式字串中，您必須將它們視為字元常值。If you want to include these elements in your format string, you must treat them as character literals. 舉例來說，範例，請參閱看[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)如需詳細資訊。See the example for an illustration, and see the [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md) topic for more information. .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關的格式字串值，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about format strings for values, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). - 如需在.NET Framework 格式支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about support for formatting in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用標準和自訂格式字串的陣列中顯示的字串表示，每個項目的值The following example uses standard and custom format strings to display the string representation of each element in an array of values [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.ToString/cs/tostring3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.ToString/vb/tostring3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數會包含在表單中的時間間隔規格：The `s` parameter contains a time interval specification in the form: [*ws*] [-] { *d* | *d*。*hh*:*公釐*[:*ss*[。*ff*]] | *hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[。*ff*]]} [*ws*][*ws*][-]{ *d* | *d*.*hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[.*ff*]] | *hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[.*ff*]] }[*ws*] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 一個選取項目從清單中的大括號括住的替代項目 （{和}），中間以分隔號分隔 (|) 是必要。One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |-|選擇性的負號，表示負。An optional minus sign, which indicates a negative .| |*d**d*|天數，範圍從 0 到 10675199。Days, ranging from 0 to 10675199.| |。.|區分文化特性符號分隔天的小時。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates days from hours. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*hh**hh*|時數，範圍從 0 到 23 之間。Hours, ranging from 0 to 23.| |::|區分文化特性的時間分隔符號的符號。The culture-sensitive time separator symbol. 非變異格式使用冒號 (":") 字元。The invariant format uses a colon (":") character.| |*mm**mm*|分鐘數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Minutes, ranging from 0 to 59.| |*ss**ss*|選擇性的秒數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Optional seconds, ranging from 0 to 59.| |。.|區分文化特性符號用來區隔來自小數秒的秒數。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates seconds from fractions of a second. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*ff**ff*|選擇性小數秒數，到七個十進位數字所組成。Optional fractional seconds, consisting of one to seven decimal digits.| 組成`s`必須共同指定時間間隔，大於或等於且小於或等於。The components of `s` must collectively specify a time interval that is greater than or equal to and less than or equal to . 方法會嘗試剖析`s`透過使用目前文化特性的特定文化特性的格式。The method tries to parse `s` by using each of the culture-specific formats for the current culture. ## 呼叫端注意事項Notes to callers 在某些情況下，當時間間隔元件會剖析字串中的包含七個以上的數字，剖析在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本中成功的作業可能會失敗並擲回在.NET Framework 4 和更新版本。In some cases, when a time interval component in the string to be parsed contains more than seven digits, parsing operations that succeed in the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions may fail and throw an in the .NET Framework 4 and later versions. 下列範例說明此案例。The following example illustrates this scenario. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/cs/tryparsefailure1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/vb/tryparsefailure1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法用來建立物件從有效字串，並表示當剖析作業失敗，因為時間範圍字串無效。The following example uses the method to create objects from valid strings and to indicate when the parse operation has failed because the time span string is invalid. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `input`參數會包含在表單中的時間間隔規格：The `input` parameter contains a time interval specification in the form: [*ws*] [-] { *d* | *d*。*hh*:*公釐*[:*ss*[。*ff*]] | *hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[。*ff*]]} [*ws*][*ws*][-]{ *d* | *d*.*hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[.*ff*]] | *hh*:*mm*[:*ss*[.*ff*]] }[*ws*] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 一個選取項目從清單中的大括號括住的替代項目 （{和}），中間以分隔號分隔 (|) 是必要。One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |-|選擇性的負號，表示負。An optional minus sign, which indicates a negative .| |*d**d*|天數，範圍從 0 到 10675199。Days, ranging from 0 to 10675199.| |。.|區分文化特性符號分隔天的小時。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates days from hours. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*hh**hh*|時數，範圍從 0 到 23 之間。Hours, ranging from 0 to 23.| |::|區分文化特性的時間分隔符號的符號。The culture-sensitive time separator symbol. 非變異格式使用冒號 (":") 字元。The invariant format uses a colon (":") character.| |*mm**mm*|分鐘數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Minutes, ranging from 0 to 59.| |*ss**ss*|選擇性的秒數，範圍從 0 至 59 之間。Optional seconds, ranging from 0 to 59.| |。.|區分文化特性符號用來區隔來自小數秒的秒數。A culture-sensitive symbol that separates seconds from fractions of a second. 非變異格式使用句號 ("。") 字元。The invariant format uses a period (".") character.| |*ff**ff*|選擇性小數秒數，到七個十進位數字所組成。Optional fractional seconds, consisting of one to seven decimal digits.| 組成`input`必須共同指定時間間隔，大於或等於且小於或等於。The components of `input` must collectively specify a time interval that is greater than or equal to and less than or equal to . 方法會嘗試剖析`input`所指定的文化特性使用每個文化特性特有格式`formatProvider`。The method tries to parse `input` by using each of the culture-specific formats for the culture specified by `formatProvider`. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. ## 呼叫端注意事項Notes to callers 在某些情況下，當時間間隔元件會剖析字串中包含七個以上的數字，剖析作業成功，且傳回版本的.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本可能會失敗，並傳回.net Framework 中4 和更新版本，下列範例說明此案例。In some cases, when a time interval component in the string to be parsed contains more than seven digits, parsing operations that succeed and return in the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions may fail and return in the.NET Framework 4 and later versions, The following example illustrates this scenario. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/cs/tryparsefailure1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeSpan.TryParse/vb/tryparsefailure1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列範例會定義各種物件，並使用每個物件的呼叫中方法來剖析字串陣列中的項目。The following example defines an array of objects, and uses each object in calls to the method to parse the elements in a string array. 此範例說明如何特定文化特性的慣例會影響格式化作業。The example illustrates how the conventions of a specific culture influence the formatting operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是所定義之格式的字串表示`format`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 這個方法很類似方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This method is similar to the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用指定的文化特性的慣例`formatProvider`參數只有當`format`是一種標準格式化其值為"g"或"G"的字串。The method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if `format` is a standard format string whose value is either "g" or "G". "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果`format`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if `format` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析數個使用不同的格式字串和文化特性的時間間隔字串表示。The following example uses the method to parse several string representations of time intervals using various format strings and cultures. [!code-csharp[System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.tryparseexact/cs/tryparseexactexample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timespan.tryparseexact/vb/tryparseexactexample1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是其中一個所指定的格式字串所定義之格式的字串表示`formats`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by one of the format strings specified by the `formats` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 這個方法很類似方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This method is similar to the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `formats`參數是字串陣列，其項目包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements consist of either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). `input` 必須確實對應到的成員`formats`的剖析作業成功。`input` must correspond exactly to a member of `formats` for the parse operation to succeed. 剖析作業會嘗試比對`input`每個項目的`formats`陣列中的第一個元素開始。The parse operation attempts to match `input` to each element in `formats` starting with the first element in the array. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用指定的文化特性的慣例`formatProvider`參數，用來剖析的格式字串時，才`input`是一種標準格式化其值為"g"或"G"的字串。The method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string whose value is either "g" or "G". "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果使用的格式字串來剖析`input`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將轉換的字串陣列，以每個項目值。The following example calls the method to convert each element of a string array to a value. 此範例會將字串解譯使用法文-法國 ("FR-FR") 文化特性的格式化慣例。The example interprets the strings by using the formatting conventions of the French - France ("fr-FR") culture. 字串可以代表一般短格式或一般長格式的時間間隔。The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format. 此外，範例會變更的時間間隔的剖析方法將解譯的單一數字的方式。In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit. 一般情況下，單一數字會解譯為時間間隔中的日數。Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval. 相反地，`%h`自訂格式字串用來將單一數字解譯成的時數。Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours. 這項變更生效，請注意，`%h`自訂格式字串前面必須加上中的其他格式字串`formats`陣列。For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是所定義之格式的字串表示`format`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 這個方法很類似方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This method is similar to the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果`format`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if `format` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. `styles`參數會影響解譯剖析使用自訂格式字串的字串。The `styles` parameter affects the interpretation of strings parsed using custom format strings. 它會判斷是否`input`會解譯為負時間間隔中，只有當負號存在 ()，或是否一律解譯為負時間間隔 ()。It determines whether `input` is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present (), or whether it is always interpreted as a negative time interval (). 如果未使用，則`format`必須包含常值的負號 (例如"\\-") 才能成功剖析負的時間間隔。If is not used, `format` must include a literal negative sign symbol (such as "\\-") to successfully parse a negative time interval. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析數個使用不同的格式字串和文化特性的時間間隔字串表示。The following example uses the method to parse several string representations of time intervals using various format strings and cultures. 它也會使用每個字串解譯為負時間間隔的值。It also uses the value to interpret each string as a negative time interval. 範例輸出說明了樣式自訂格式字串搭配使用時，才會影響傳回的值。The output from the example illustrates that the style affects the return value only when it is used with custom format strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析時間間隔，必須是其中一個所指定的格式字串所定義之格式的字串表示`formats`參數，但會忽略該前置和尾端空白字元。The method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by one of the format strings specified by the `formats` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. 這個方法很類似方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。This method is similar to the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `formats`參數是字串陣列，其項目包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements consist of either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`. 如需有關有效的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)並[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md). `input` 必須確實對應到的成員`formats`的剖析作業成功。`input` must correspond exactly to a member of `formats` for the parse operation to succeed. 剖析作業會嘗試比對`input`每個項目的`formats`陣列中的第一個元素開始。The parse operation attempts to match `input` to each element in `formats` starting with the first element in the array. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會使用指定的文化特性的慣例`formatProvider`參數，用來剖析的格式字串時，才`input`是一種標準格式化其值為"g"或"G"的字串。The method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string whose value is either "g" or "G". "C"、"t"和"T"標準格式字串會使用不區分文化特性的格式化慣例。The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 自訂格式字串定義精確的輸入字串格式，並使用常值字元隔開的時間間隔的元件。Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval. `formatProvider`參數是實作，可提供特定文化特性格式資訊的傳回的字串，如果使用的格式字串來剖析`input`是標準格式字串。The `formatProvider` parameter is an implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A物件，定義傳回之字串的格式。A object that defines the formatting of the returned string. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`formatProvider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object that is associated with the current culture is used. `styles`參數會影響解譯使用自訂格式字串會剖析的字串。The `styles` parameter affects the interpretation of strings that are parsed using custom format strings. 它會判斷是否`input`會解譯為負時間間隔中，只有當負號存在 ()，或是否一律解譯為負時間間隔 ()。It determines whether `input` is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present (), or whether it is always interpreted as a negative time interval (). 如果未使用，則`format`必須包含常值的負號 (例如"\\-") 才能成功剖析負的時間間隔。If is not used, `format` must include a literal negative sign symbol (such as "\\-") to successfully parse a negative time interval. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將轉換的字串陣列，以每個項目值。The following example calls the method to convert each element of a string array to a value. 字串可以代表一般短格式或一般長格式的時間間隔。The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format. 此外，範例會變更的時間間隔的剖析方法將解譯的單一數字的方式。In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit. 一般情況下，單一數字會解譯為時間間隔中的日數。Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval. 相反地，`%h`自訂格式字串用來將單一數字解譯成的時數。Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours. 這項變更生效，請注意，`%h`自訂格式字串前面必須加上中的其他格式字串`formats`陣列。For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array. 也請注意，輸出中，只有在使用此格式規範剖析的字串時，才使用方法呼叫中指定的旗標。Also note from the output that the flag specified in the method call is used only when parsing a string with this format specifier. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為值欄位是物件，代表零時間值，您可以比較它與其他物件以判斷是否後者表示肯定、 非零或負數時間間隔。Because the value of the field is a object that represents a zero time value, you can compare it with other objects to determine whether the latter represent positive, non-zero, or negative time intervals. 您也可以使用此欄位來初始化為零的時間值的物件。You can also use this field to initialize a object to a zero time value. ## Examples 下列範例會參考，並顯示的值欄位。The following example references and displays the value of the field.
